body.name: Expandable Bamboo Kitchen Drawer Organizer for Cutlery and Utensils, Adjustable Bamboo Wood Cutlery Tray in Drawer for Flatware and Silverware in Kitchen, (Natural)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: [START YOUR KITCHEN ORGANIZATION]: The 10.04" - 15.5" wide, 13.98" long and 1.97" deep bamboo drawer organizer can tame your out-of-control kitchen drawers, to store and organize the cutlery and kitchen utensils according to your rules, and maximize the drawer storage. Keep everything accessible and organized, so that you don't have to rifle around for your cooking tools. Beautiful and practical kitchen drawer organizer turns the cooking and tasting into things of beauty and efficiency.

[BRING AESTHETICS INTO YOUR KITCHEN]: This drawer organizer, crafted with premium natural bamboo, featuring the elegant texture and warm tone, can blend in with most drawer interior and room decor. Besides smooth surface and lines, curve design of slot walls brings a flexible sense of order for convenient access to tools. Versatile decorative organizer for kitchen countertop or drawers in bathroom, bedroom, living room and even home office to store makeup, jewelry, office stationery, etc.

[RELIABLE DURABILITY]: Your natural and earth-friendly bamboo cutlery tray is sturdy and durable - not easy to crack and warp - thanks to a series of dehydration, drying and other processes to eliminate the inner stress. Well polished surface and edges will not hurt your hands. The Traditional tight assembly structure adds extra durability. With the smooth sliding design, your adjustable cutlery and utensils organizer can fit over 95% standard sized drawers.

[CLUTTER-FREE STORAGE]: Your expandable drawer organizer with 5-7 compartments serves not only as a cutlery organizer in drawer to store flatware and silverware like forks, knives and spoons, but also as a kitchen drawer organizer for large utensils like ladles, tongs and whisks. Keep all the kitchen gadgets in the right place and make the cooking hassle-free with your drawer organizer, so that you can save time and effort for fun things during the cooking.

[EASY TO CLEAN AND MAINTAIN]: Wash your bamboo kitchen drawer organizer with warm water, then wipe down with a damp cloth and air dry. Adhering to environmental protection and sustainable development principles, ORIDOM is committed to developing and producing bamboo products to add beauty, simplicity and convenience to your home. Your satisfaction is our #1 priority - 24/7 customer service stands by. If you have any question, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ORIDOM, Bring Beauty and Order to Your Kitchen Are you still worrying about how to deal with your chaotic kitchen drawers? Are you still hunting for confusing kitchen gadgets when cooking? ORIDOM bamboo kitchen drawer organizer can completely solve your problem. Beautiful and elegant, but also sturdy and practical, the cutlery and utensils organizer is a must-have product in your kitchen.

Premium Bamboo Material Bamboo is a kind of natural and renewable resource, and is also harder and denser than wood with good bending and cracking resistance performance. ORIDOM is always committed to taking environmental protection as our corporate social responsibility and support sustainable development concept. We will keep developing and producing both beautiful and practical bamboo household products to make your life better and more convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! Expendable is a plus
reviews.reviewText: I've been wanting to organize my drawer, so this is the time. This product is superb, with expandable tray the size fits perfectly on my drawer. The wood is of good quality and craftsmanship was obviously well thought.This is highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Love the Color…
reviews.reviewText: Thoroughly pleased with this organizer. Like the sustainability of bamboo but have the aesthetically pleasing color versus the natural tones. Like how it expands perfectly in my drawer and allows me to utilize all space for organization. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, Love, Love!
reviews.reviewText: This drawer organizer is absolutely perfect! It expands to fit my drawer perfectly, and looks like it’s actually built inside the drawer. My husband who was a Quality Control Director before he retired was very impressed and also gives this 5 stars. Don’t hesitate to purchase this organizer if you are looking for a sturdy, adjustable organizer for your silverware. Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large storage, organized drawer.
reviews.reviewText: This fits well in our drawer, I just wish it would expand a little more to reach the edge width of my drawer. It’s been hard to find an option any wider. The only complaint I have is how much it slides in a wooden drawer. They included a few plastic dots to put on the bottom, but that hasn’t fixed it. If it fit the drawer perfectly it wouldn’t move, but the depth of my drawer allows it to slide front to back more than I’d like. I’m considering hot glue dots on the bottom to give it something to stick with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This put order to my “ miscellaneous “ drawer & it looks so good. It is well made& easily expandable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This looks amazing
reviews.reviewText: Stretches out to make it bigger or smaller. Nice color. Plenty of room. Good price. Willl last. Arrived quickly. So happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well in my drawer
reviews.reviewText: I love that this goes edge to edge in my drawer, so no awkward spaces around the edges. It's a little short lengthwise, but I can probably get a narrow holder to fit in the gap. It could have been a bit deeper, but I did manage to put my new set of flatware for 12 in it. Well packaged. Satisfied with this purchase. I may buy another for my utensil drawer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are a very nice product for the money. If I had paid more I may have expected there to be a little less play in the expanding mechanism but for the price no complaints at all. Has a nice finish, I'm sure they will last a long time.

Sure it holds cutlery as claimed, but overall, it's your typical capitalism biproduct. Don't buy this unless you're okay with being overcharged for a mediocre item.The good:- It holds cutlery.- It's the correct measurements.The bad:- This is the quality I'd expect at the dollar store.- The base of the product is made of a cardboard composite material with a fake wood pattern printed on it. Not 100% bamboo as claimed.- Flimsy. As pictured, the parts made of real wood are splintering in various places and its held together by loose nails.- Weird black spotted stains which don't wash off, and it was a bit dusty.- Personally felt the need to disinfect it before putting my cutlery in it.My thoughts:I can live with it, but it's not worth the asking price. This is a great example of why I don't like to online shop for products like this anymore.
